website_summaries.verdict: A good buy in a solid cotton duvet cover that is durable and well-designed.
pros: Ideal for those who prefer all cotton, this duvet cover stands out for being durable, resisting fading and pilling, and keeping the duvet insert in place
Many users also praise the softness and good fit
cons: A few feel that this style is too stiff, and some think it wrinkles too easily

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this item because it only had one review and I rely heavily on reviews when purchasing from Amazon. It just arrived today and the fabric is nice and workmanship looks good too. Haven’t used it yet so I’ll update this review later if it changes but as of today I’m quite happy with my purchase and the price was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne W

customer_reviews.title: very nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: definitely very nice cotton duvet cover. it’s held up through several washes so far and really helps tie everything together in my room
customer_reviews.author: Jess jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect simple duvet cover, well made zipper, no complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: zoom

customer_reviews.title: ❤️just buy it
customer_reviews.text: This duvet it so comfy, it stays pretty cool, stains come out easily with a bit of peroxide. It’s ideals and looks so nice
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put over a “down alternative “ comforter for the guest room. This cotton duvet is perfect and gives the polyester comforter a great natural, breathable feel. Easy to clean. Easy to put over a comforter.
customer_reviews.author: GLane

customer_reviews.title: Super soft.
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. Super soft and comfortable. Definitely would purchase again. Highly recommend. My favorite blanket of all. I love that I can put this over and wash it frequently without taking up the whole wash. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I’m very satisfied with this product. It’s an excellent value as well as being warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: H. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice duvet. I was looking for something that wasn’t to heavy but also not easy to wrinkle. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Fit great

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my parents
customer_reviews.text: My parents wanted a queen size duvet cover and they explicitly asked for the ones made from 100% cotton. I bought this from amazon for them and they seem satisfied with it. The good: - Very well packed, and looks good as a gift set. - Soft and gentle. My parents specifically asked for a duvet cover not made for man-made fiber. - Reasonable priced, comparing to similar product from my local department store. Feedback for improvement. - The only available texture is plain-look, which is a little boring. - This is a little pricey
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Want my money back
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke after one use. I seriously had it on my comforter over night & it broke. I bought the right size and everything. The cover is nice but the zipper is VERY cheap & flemsy. I like the wrinkled look. I will not buy this again. As a matter of fact I took it off & stuck it in the closet. Waste of money. Wish I could get what I paid for it back.
customer_reviews.author: jessica taylor

customer_reviews.title: I'm in blanket love!
customer_reviews.text: So so soft. It's very pretty as well. I wish it came in more patterns so I could get another one lol
customer_reviews.author: HyperboleEverAfter

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The seams inside this duvet cover are unfinished which means that the edges unravel after the first washing and continue to pull away from the raw edge. I have never seen such poor quality and wonder if other buyers have experienced the same Additionally, the color is not a true white It has a purple hue to it and clashes with all my other white bedding Lastly, the plastic zipper is also of very poor quality. I wonder how long it would last. With all those long, loose threads all over the inside it is only a matter of time before this jams the zipper. I am extremely disappointed by this item
customer_reviews.author: Chase P.

customer_reviews.title: Not soft, not comfortable, wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was really pleased by the reviews after searching for bedding for hours. I really tried to like this but even after washing the material was very stiff. I recently replaced this with a jersey knit cotton material and that is what I was looking for. Unfortunately, softness is not something that I could use to describe these. Also, it made the comforter feel much heavier and overall I couldn’t wait to stop sleeping in this... would not buy again. The worst part is that after one wash, this material started “pilling” giving off lint every time I sat down on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully simple design
customer_reviews.text: Buy it! It is soft and well made! Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Brandie

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as the picture would have you believe
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes the duvet look a lot nicer than it actually is. That's not to say it's cheap looking or an outright bad buy...just don't expect to get the pretty, shimmery copper colored duvet in the picture. The duvet is thick and it's definitely not a Walmart-type quality, so at least it has that going for it. It's just a blah, matte chocolate brown color which is a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Rhi M

customer_reviews.title: Soft, high quality cover
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure I liked this at first, it was kind of stiff out of the package. But after a few washes it's gotten considerably softer and has held up very well. We use this in an Airbnb room so we wash it a lot, and it seems be handling the wear well. It does wrinkle easily, but not huge wrinkles. It looks textured like linen, which is actually a bonus. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: (See edit) I DREAD putting this duvet cover on
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: I’ve been contacted by the seller multiple times apologizing for my negative experience. I appreciate their commitment in reaching out to customers. They say they have changed manufacturers so the short tie problem may no longer be an issue although I cannot confirm. ———- Don’t get me wrong, it’s comfortable. But I absolutely hate putting the cover back on after washing because the ties in my duvet cover are literally an inch long and nearly impossible to tie to my insert. It makes me think this was definitely machine made and there was no quality control. Putting the duvet cover on takes me way too much time and is extremely frustrating due to how short the corner ties are.
customer_reviews.author: Koa

customer_reviews.title: It's pure cotton and very comfortable on the skin
customer_reviews.text: I have received the four-piece set. The color is very nice. I bought the white one with excellent quality.High - end atmosphere on the class, is really worth!Do not want to like, take to wash, do not transform.Soft, comfortable and nice color.Sheet quilt cover is more close skin, the quality of fabric cotton cotton soft is very good, I general summer also only sleep cotton sheet, do not sleep mat, open air conditioning to sleep very comfortable.The four-piece set is really nice to buy in summer. It looks clean and fresh on the bed. The fabric is comfortable to sleep on and the cover is also comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price but NOT Soft at all
customer_reviews.text: Ok. For $40, this is an OK duvet cover. And just that. OK, Nothing more. The pillow cases look like someone sewed them at home with a regular seeing machine; not professional quality. And let's not even get on the roughness of this thing... What is it? 200 thread count!? Ugh, not sure why it has almost 5 stars on here. Come on guys... SMH.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was beautiful💕 with my duvet it feels like a cloud!
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: light weight and super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very soft and comfortable. I love the cotton fabric so much. it’s light weight and good for spring, summer ,and fall to use。I probably will use a heavy weight one in winter because I am cold all the times. I bought the white color one and it shows a slightly pink shade when it’s folded, but it won’t show after you unfold and add comfort in. I may order a gray one for my other bedding.
customer_reviews.author: love DIY

customer_reviews.title: W-O-W
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this thing. I had originally bought a comforter that was way too hot for me and as soon as I put this on, I slept like a baby because of how cool to the touch it is. One of the best decisions I've ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Mad T

customer_reviews.title: Fresh bedsheets that feel nice
customer_reviews.text: After washing these and finally laying these out, I've had a few days to review and nothing is wrong with these. Soft and non irritable. My last set of sheets made me itchy at night, but that could be because they were old. My boyfriend made me buy these and I'm happy with the results. I don't wake up with bumps and scratches any more!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie N.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable duvet
customer_reviews.text: This is what I was looking for, affordable, 100% cotton made and thick enough. My sons have eczema and I can't buy anything else but 100% cotton. This duvet cover is not comparably with Egyptian cotton quality, but is soft and affordable comparing to other brands. I definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: P.Chung

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT COTTON...AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: This duvet cover is so overpriced because it is advertised as 100 percent cotton but the label on it literally says its 100 percent polyester! Also, my duvet keeps slipping inside the cover even though I tied it with the corner straps. Will be returning asap because this is ridiculous. Not even 1% of cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: 100% cotton
customer_reviews.text: I only like 100% cotton, finally I bought this one. It arrived last weekend and I washed and used it immdiately. It is well made with good quality, it is solid 600 thread cotton. It didn't shrink a lot after washing. The size fits well with my queen size comforter. Very soft and comfort due to 100% cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: NOT A COMFORTER
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a new white comforter and white it may in fact be my own fault for not thouroughly reading the details... I'm disappointed that I received a sheet and two pillow slips.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: B-
customer_reviews.text: Not as upscale as I was hoping. It serves a purpose but basically just like a sheet sewn together. Not really appropriate as a top comforter. I ended up adding a nicer comforter on top. Definitely needed to be ironed after I washed it the first time and I’m not using the pillow shams because they came out so small and wrinkled. Looked very shabby.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Clean look
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the duvet cover for a not so ready for the trash comforter. For the price I was surprised it had ties to secure it in place. It was very wrinkled out the wash. I had to fight with it because o forgot how to cover the counter. I won!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: We are hot sleepers and I purchased a cooling comforter and I wanted to make sure that the duvet I purchased would not trap any heat. This duvet cover is great. Being 100% cotton was important to me but making sure it was a soft smooth feel. It’s not a scratchy material which I have had in the past you can tell it’s quality. It washes up great and it’s a nice white color, not cream or any weird tint. Love that it has ties on all four corners to keep the comforter in place. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: taylor919

customer_reviews.title: Supper comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice blanket, I have a hard time getting to sleep, so I’m always trying to try different things blankets sheets ECT.. not that a blanket can help with this but it made a little difference in me getting to sleep, it really soft like a baby And the price isn’t so bad for this type of comforter, thanks I love it..
customer_reviews.author: MariA

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware! The zipper broke after the first wash. Quality just is not there !
customer_reviews.author: God bless Texas

customer_reviews.title: like it ~!
customer_reviews.text: Washed in water, did not fade, and it was easy to dry, dry in a day. Put it on the bed and try it. It's good. There is only one minor drawback. The pillowcase is a little darker than the sheet. It would be perfect if it were all pillowcase colors.
customer_reviews.author: Holder Hadwin

customer_reviews.title: Cotton Duvet Cover Set zippers break off
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately several of the zipper heads came off after a few months Nd very little use. Now I have to buy new ones. Waste of money and time. I do not recommend. ( old review. Snail 100-Percent Cotton Duvet Cover Set, Hidden Zipper Closure, Ultra Soft, Durable and Fade Resist says it all. I recommend it)
customer_reviews.author: CarLar

customer_reviews.title: Get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for a cheapie. Gotta be somewhat delicate with the zipper and the ties. I don’t think this will last a year... next time I’ll splurge since I may use it for 10+ years. I like the zipper type though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tolentino

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: My son has sensitive skin and he doesn't have the problem with this cover set. It is very soft and comfortable. I am also like the zipper design because it doesn't scratch the skin when you are sleeping and it is very convenient to keep the duvet in the cover and take it out to do the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: ryder su

customer_reviews.title: 100% cotton keeps me cool
customer_reviews.text: I got the queen white cover and it's the perfect size for my comforter. The 100% cotton keeps me cool and not overly hot. The zippers make it super easy to close and the tie inside keeps the comforter in place. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Needs more ties for the Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I rated these a 4 star because these need more ties to secure the comforters. When I got it I still had to add 4 more ties to secure my comforter. Comforter has 8 loops and cover only at the corners. Other than that this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce Easterling

customer_reviews.title: Cool, lightweight, breathable cover!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I love this! I originally went with microfiber duvet covers but realized it’s too heavy and gets hot easily so I tried out these cotton ones and omg I’m so glad I did! They’re obvi not as soft as microfiber but after I washed them they were fine. Recommend to anyone especially someone that gets hot easily since cotton is more breathable than microfiber.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to Iron....and the white looks blueish
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several of the white zippered duvet covers from Colorful Snail for my VRBO. I am giving the product 3 stars because the white color has a very bright blue/purple tone and they wrinkle terribly. I have tried every laundry trick in the books to keep these linens from being big wrinkle bags but to no avail. On the flip side, they are soft, feel like quality cotton and the so far the zippers are performing nicely.
customer_reviews.author: mimitz

customer_reviews.title: BED
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very comfortable, the size is just right, the color is also my favorite, not easy to get dirty, this price is very good, I can't buy such a cheap suit in the store.
customer_reviews.author: candy

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of thread count
customer_reviews.text: Came in packaged like any other duvet set, clean, didn't smell of chemicals but still put it through the wash. The fabric is itchy not quite soft to what I'm used to however for the price + convenience due to sheer necessity this was a decent purchase. The white color is cool tinted, has a blue-ish hue.
customer_reviews.author: SaikoAsh

customer_reviews.title: Pure white: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! I have been looking for a lightweight duvet cover with a simple and elegant feel, and the look is just right! At the same time, it increases the texture, visual appeal and has a silky feel. The inner fabric is soft and lightweight, more like a microfiber fabric. I like zippers. My quilt Overall, I like it.. It is soft, fits and it is pure white. It is worth buying again in the future and trying more different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ranson

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but......
customer_reviews.text: I really love the weight and softness of this duvet cover. It was exactly what I was looking for. My only complaint would be that the zipper seems funky. I wonder how long it will last. At any rate I’m keeping it because I love how it looks and it is for a guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Mc

customer_reviews.title: A perfect plain white sheet duvet cover
customer_reviews.text: Like that I could buy a duvet cover at a decent price. We use a bead spread so I just wanted a sheet duvet cover. This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Devine-jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Not white..blue tint
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great feeling, but upon arrival I opened it to find that the cover has a slight blue tint to it. It’s very noticeable up against an entirely white bedding ensemble. I really do think it feels very soft, the quality seemed nice to me, but I can’t get over the blue tint because of the rest of my bedding being all white.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Bourgoin

customer_reviews.title: So cozy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first duvet I've ever had on my bed, and it just feels so cozy and luxurious, like I'm swaddled in fabric and warmth! If you've never used a duvet, definitely give this a try!
customer_reviews.author: Pineapplesareperilous

customer_reviews.title: Pinkish tiny town
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a few months back and just used for the first time. The white has a pinkish tint to it and fabric very thin. I wish I could return or exchange as not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHITE; TINTED PINK
customer_reviews.text: The white is not actually white. It’s tinted a bit pink, but super noticeable when your sheets & pillow cases are white.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cotton duvet cover
customer_reviews.text: Great price for an actual soft cotton duvet cover. Love it! The zipper had some cloth caught in it but that was a quick easy fix. I only wish it came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Quite thin material - in particular on the pillow shams you can see the labels on the pillows clearly through the material. Not particularly luxurious. The duvet cover fits well and the zipper closure is good quality. Overall not terrible but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So soft- I have never bought any bedding online, but through reviews I picked this one out. It is amazing. Soft, sized appropriately and a crisp white. I’m very happy!
customer_reviews.author: HappyCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Best duvet cover for this picky girl
customer_reviews.text: Glad I made this purchase. I’m a very picky purchaser and I do all my research before buying and I just love this duvet cover! It’s a bright winter white color, feels fresh like a thick cotton sheet and is easy to install the duvet insert with the tie tabs at each corner!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy duvet cover in IKEA, but due to the shelter in place policy, I decided to buy it on Amazon. I am surprised by the colourful snail duvet cover set! It is the same as the hotel quality. I would definitely consider buy the same product next time.
customer_reviews.author: Wiwi

customer_reviews.title: Good-fitting lightweight cotton duvet
customer_reviews.text: Covers my queen-sized comforter perfectly. Material is simple cotton, but didn't shrink when washed/dried first time (yea).
customer_reviews.author: Frankshoes

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This set is soft, and comfortable. It is a classic design. Zippered bottomed and ties in the corners. Well made. I’ve washed it a couple times now and I’m still satisfied. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen engelman

customer_reviews.title: zipper was  partially detached on  arrival
customer_reviews.text: the zipper is only lightly attached to the cover and 50% not attached at alll. makes the whole thing pretty worthless.
customer_reviews.author: sloanSeven

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Luxurious feel. Very nice. As with all duvet covers, it’s a pain to put over duvet.
customer_reviews.author: Alre83

customer_reviews.title: My friend bought this for me
customer_reviews.text: Of course I prefer buying duvet covers for my bed at stores to check the fabric. A friend of mine bought this for me and I'm surprised when she told me she got this online. Now I'm planning to buy one for our daughter's queen sized bed. I'm pretty sure she'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: The duvet is nice and intact. This is one thing I always check on first before I consider to buy comforter. I always look for the quality and I don’t mind the price but this one is surprising good for its price. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy if you plan on washing more than 5 times.
customer_reviews.text: I have put this through the wash exactly 5 times. on the fifth time, the zipper fell completely off and the stitching keeping the zipper part together came completely undone. What a huge waste of money..
customer_reviews.author: Camille K

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the $
customer_reviews.text: Easy on. Only thing of concern is the zipper looks a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Soft close skin
customer_reviews.text: Very skin-friendly, very soft, very fond!There are three colors available: white, gray, and pink.The colors are beautiful.I chose my favorite color, white.Super comfortable cotton, very soft to the touch, really worth it.I recommend it to you, please feel free to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of duvet covers and was surprised at how affordable this was for being 100% cotton. I washed it before the first use and it's so soft and comfortable! Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Karabach

customer_reviews.title: Decent duvet cover
customer_reviews.text: Nothing exciting about this duvet cover. Does the job, but wouldn't buy it again because it's somewhat difficult to put on the duvet and wrinkles extremely easily.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea D

customer_reviews.title: Great white duvets
customer_reviews.text: Great fabric, good design. Perfect for our all white bedding in our airbnbs
customer_reviews.author: Oh that betty

customer_reviews.title: It’s very good accessory for our bedroom
customer_reviews.text: It is soft enough to sleep under without a sheet but strong enough to last a long time. I was looking for a way to our guest room, but my husband very like it. So it is using in our bedroom. It was a great buying experience.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and neat! Appreciate the zipper on it since everything I’ve owned before had buttons on the duvet cover. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Once you get it zipped up the inside Blanket balls up on one side. Leaving the duvet like a sheet on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra S

customer_reviews.title: Soft and confortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought Queen size and white color. Smooth touch and fit to my bed. 3sets only needs 26 dollars are cheap. highly recommend those sets.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: If you love ironing, this is the product for you!
customer_reviews.text: This product was not well made and even when taken straight out of the drier, it was fully wrinkled. We would never want to order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Bronson

customer_reviews.title: The quilt is light!
customer_reviews.text: The collective down locking technology can keep warm at constant temperature. Compared with the quilt, down has more air permeability, strong moisture discharge, no odor, large down flowers, better warmth retention. The baby can sleep at ease, light and comfortable, and has a comfortable sleep experience every day.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Bond

customer_reviews.title: Ripped upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately mine arrived ripped at the seam. Probably cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: TDel

customer_reviews.title: don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: way to big.....overlaps and makes your bed look messy. I have to get a different duvet
customer_reviews.author: Farrah Singh

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: Very practical and comfortable, consistent with the size of my bed, satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Kent G. Sieg

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this duvet easy to put comforter in holds real well love the zippers
customer_reviews.author: Trish Fox

customer_reviews.title: good quality set
customer_reviews.text: This duvet cover is very white. After wash this set, the quality is still very good. smooth feeling and heavy material. I like this set.
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: Good choice!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It is super comfortable, super stylish and looks superb in the bedroom. Finally something which pairs up well with the bed and complements my sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not white at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in white. It is obviously pink compared to white sheets. Washed it and it is still pink. Have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Chantigny

customer_reviews.title: Seam Opening Minor Flaw
customer_reviews.text: There is a four inch section of the seam that is not sewn closed. It is used on a guest room bed and will not get much use, so it probably will not open further. It is soft and washed nicely.
customer_reviews.author: barbara c brown

customer_reviews.title: So nice!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my bed's size as well. The cottony feeling what makes it super soft as advertised. So cuddly at night. I would definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Annalicia

customer_reviews.title: Very comfort and good
customer_reviews.text: The Duvet Cover provides a warm and cozy feeling with its ultra-soft and fluffy material. it is also suited for machine washing with little to no shrinkage or fading.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie G.

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: Material is very rough, and it's impossible to get the wrinkles out without ironing. The inside of the cover has tons of loose threads and I don't expect it to last very long. Would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: The logistics is very fast, the product fabrics are comfortable, you can sleep comfortably after laying it, dry and breathable, the thickness is moderate, not easy to deform, you sleep comfortably every night, the price is affordable, and a very satisfying shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Dean

customer_reviews.title: So nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: They have sewed different size squares on this piece so it is defected and I wouldn't give for a gift, but it is a good quality spread
customer_reviews.author: Lucile Yaney

customer_reviews.title: Brand Label too noticeable, impossible to remove
customer_reviews.text: The brand label is very visible on the pillow cases and duvet, and is sewn into the seam, so it very, very difficult to remove. I would probably not buy this again unless the manufacturer made the labels easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Faye

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am really in love with this super soft product. I found it pretty useful in winter and summer. I wash it in the machine and it comes out intact. Amazingly, its color remained fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Collins

customer_reviews.title: Crisp yet soft cotton, thick
customer_reviews.text: Feels like it will last. Has a crisp yet a bit soft cotton feel. The zipper is very convenient, but it is not a very strong zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Not white
customer_reviews.text: This was not white, it had a pink hue to it. Not happy at all with the purchase. It was not soft either. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and nice
customer_reviews.text: The color matches my taste and my bedroom’s neutral color. I might be ordering another for my mum’s birthday. I’m sure she’ll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for about a year, no stains
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Marie Kerichenko

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Been washing it many times and the texture felt the same-good as new. The quality itself I think makes it lasts long. Very much recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Ahh Cotton!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the zipper. Looks great on my bed. I’m a big fan of cotton so this is a great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter
customer_reviews.text: My 15 y.o. grandaughter is in love with it !

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: If you need a duvet buy this one. I searched and searched for the perfect white duvet. This is it! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Product was missing one of the corner ties and had a 5 inch long tear in the seam
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good cotton duvet cover set!
customer_reviews.text: I like white color, it looks clean and fresh. Full cotton doesn't hurt the sensitive skin, it's soft and breathable. Hidden zipper closure is nice and convenient. Really good cotton duvet cover set!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Arrive on time
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived well packed and on time. I first noticed the quality of the fabric. It's so soft and comfy. What you see on photo is what you will get. I am not disappointed buying this online. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I missed a lot of choices. My sleep quality has not been very good. This product makes me sleep easy and comfortable. It makes my spirit better and I can work more efficiently. It is easy to clean and will not deform.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Grasser

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, well stitched at the seam, the hidden zipper closure is a great idea which won't hurt the skin when covering on body. 100% cotton is perfect for the sensitive skin, it won't be harmful.? Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: James

product_meta.title: Colourful Snail 100-Percent Cotton Duvet Cover Set, Hidden Zipper Closure, Ultra Soft, Durable and Fade Resistant, Queen/Full, White
feature_bullets: Hidden zipper closure, convenient to get the duvet in and out of the cover; Corner ties, to keep your duvet insert or comforter in place
Full/Queen Size: 1 Duvet Cover (90"x90"), 2 Pillow Shams (20"x26")
High quality cotton fabric: Soft, Breathable, Machine washable and Never fade. The 100% cotton fabric will be wrinkled after washing, but it will feel more soft and comfortable
Duvet Covers slip over your existing comforter creating new luxury look
